Everyone loves a good button! They are great fun because of all the different styling options to experiment with:

- Color
- Corner Radius
- Height
- Text Size
- All Caps vs. Lowercase

On top of that, every button needs to have different styling for these 5 states:

- Disabled
- Enabled
- Hover
- Focused
- Pressed

For those who are wondering, the â€œFocusedâ€ state occurs when the viewer is using a Screenreader to tab through the elements of the page.

- Polaris (by Shopify)
- Carbon (by IBM)
- Pegasus
- Fluent (by Mircosoft)
